name: refresh
description: 1. Run http-server in root directory 2. Open in browser 3. Open dev tools 4. Copy contents of script.js into dev tools console 5. Set `const textToFind = TEXT_TO_FIND`. For test page, use Math.pow(10, n). 6. Set `const logTime = BOOLEAN`. 7. Run `refresh(textToFind, logTime)` in console.
